product_name: Outdoor Research Oasis Sombrero Hat - Women's
long_description: Worry about the sun on your head no more! The Outdoor Research Oasis sombrero hat provides plenty of cool shade and UPF 50+ SolarShield(TM) protection. Sombrero-style hat has a 5-in.-wide brim that provides total coverage front to back. Foam-stiffened brim channels precipitation away from your head during long pours; brim keeps the hat afloat in water. External drawcord adjustment lets you fine-tune the fit of the hat. Nylon/polyester sweatband wicks away perspiration for a cool, dry day in the sun no matter the activity. Outdoor Research Oasis sombrero features a long removable chin strip with cordlock that keeps that on your head when the winds pick up.
short_description: Worry about the sun on your head no more! The Outdoor Research Oasis sombrero hat provides plenty of cool shade and UPF 50+ SolarShield(TM) protection.
